title: Japan Government Statistics Analyzer Input
description: Configure the search criteria to find and extract specific statistical data from the Japanese government's e-Stat portal. Start with a keyword or leave fields blank to explore.

searchKeyword.title: Search Keyword(s)
searchKeyword.description: Enter keywords in Japanese to find relevant statistical tables. For example: "人口" (population), "経済" (economy), "労働力調査" (Labour Force Survey).

surveyYears.title: Survey Year(s)
surveyYears.description: Filter data by specific year(s). You can provide a single year (e.g., "2020"), a comma-separated list ("2020,2022"), or a range ("2019-2021").

statsField.title: Statistics Field Code (Advanced)
statsField.description: For advanced users. A 2 or 4-digit code to filter by a specific statistical field (e.g., "02" for Population, "0301" for Labor Force).

maxItems.title: Maximum Tables to Process
maxItems.description: The maximum number of statistical tables to find and process. A higher number will result in a longer run time.

outputFormat.title: Output Data Format
outputFormat.description: Choose the format for the output data. 'Structured' is recommended for most use cases.

includeMetadata.title: Include Detailed Metadata
includeMetadata.description: If checked, each data record will include a comprehensive metadata object with details about the data's source and structure.

delayBetweenRequests.title: Delay Between Requests (ms)
delayBetweenRequests.description: The delay in milliseconds between consecutive API requests to avoid rate limiting. Recommended to keep at 1000ms or higher.
